karyotype: Hoʻonohonoho piha o nā chromosomes i loko o ke kino
homologous: ʻO nā Chromosome i like ke ʻano a lawe i nā genes no nā ʻano like
meiosis: ʻO ke kaʻina hoʻokaʻawale pūnaewele e hoʻohua ai i nā gametes (sperm a me ka hua manu) me ka hapalua o ka helu o nā chromosomes e like me ke kelepona makua.
mitosis: ʻO ke kaʻina hoʻokaʻawale pūnaewele e hoʻohua ai i nā pūnaewele hou me ka helu like o nā chromosomes me ka cell makua
karyotyping: Ke kālailai ʻana i nā chromosomes o ke kanaka e ʻike ai i nā mea ʻino
genotype: ʻO ke ʻano genetic o ke kino
phenotype: ʻIke ʻia nā hiʻohiʻona o ke kino, e hoʻoholo ʻia e ka genotype a me ke kaiapuni
mana nui: Allele e uhi ana i ka hopena o ka allele recessive i ka wā e noho ana ma ka chromosome hoʻokahi
ho\u02bbopane\u02bbe: ʻAlele i uhi ʻia e kahi alale nui ke loaʻa ma ka chromosome hoʻokahi
punnett square: Hoʻohana ʻia ke kiʻikuhi e wānana i ka loaʻa ʻana o nā ʻano kikoʻī i nā keiki
biotechnology: Ka hoʻohana ʻana i nā mea ola a i ʻole kā lākou huahana e hoʻololi a hana i nā huahana a i ʻole nā kaʻina hana hou
gmo: ʻO ka acronym i hāʻawi ʻia i nā meaola nona ka genetic makeup i hoʻololi ʻia ma ke ʻano i kū ʻole ʻia.
l\u0101\u02bbau lapa\u02bbau: ʻO ka hoʻomākaukau olaola e hāʻawi i ka palekana i kahi maʻi kūikawā
virus: He lāʻau maʻi e hoʻopili wale ana i loko o nā pūnaewele o kahi mea hoʻokipa
\u02bb\u014dnae\u02bba n\u016bn\u016b: Pūnaehana o nā pūnaewele kūikawā e hoʻouna i ka ʻike ma ke kino
\u02bb\u014dnaehana endocrine: Pūnaehana o nā ʻeleʻele e hana i nā hormones e hoʻoponopono i nā hana like ʻole o ke kino
\u02bb\u014dnaehana ka\u02bba koko: Pūnaehana o nā ʻōpū a me nā moku e lawe i ke koko a puni ke kino
\u02bb\u014dnaehana pale: Pūnaehana o nā pūnaewele a me nā ʻāpana e pale ana i ke kino mai ka maʻi
pathogen: Microorganism a i ʻole ka maʻi maʻi
ho\u02bbololi ho\u02bbololi: ʻO ke ʻano e hāʻawi i ke ola a i ʻole ka pōmaikaʻi hānau i ke kino i kona kaiapuni
speciation: Ke kaʻina hana e puka mai ai nā ʻano mea hou mai kahi ʻano i loaʻa
